name: miTLS
description: a verified reference implementation of TLS

name: HACL*
description: a verified library of cryptographic primitives

name: EverCrypt
description: Verified crypto provider that combines HACL* and Vale via an agile cryptographic API

name: EverParse
description: Automatic generation of verified parsers and serializers for binary data formats

name: F*
description: A proof assistant and verification language for effectful programs

name: KaRaMeL
description: a compiler from a subset of F* to C; used by EverParse, miTLS and HACL*

name: Z3
description: SMT solver; used by F* and Dafny

name: Dafny
description: a program verifier; used by Vale
